st: Khyalon mein wahi, sapno mein wahi,
s:
Khyalon mein wahi, sapno mein wahi,
Lekin unki yaadon mein hum the hi nahi,
Hum jaagte rahe duniya soti rahi,
Ek baarish hi thi, jo humare sath roti rahi.

st: Barsat ki bheegi raaton mein fir koi suhani yaad aayi,
s:
Barsat ki bheegi raaton mein fir koi suhani yaad aayi,
Kuchh apna jamana yaad aaya kuchh unki jawani yaad aayi,
Hum bhool chuke the jisne hamein duniya mein akela chhor diya,
Jab gaur kiya to ek surat jaani pehchani yaad aayi.

st: Aye barish zara tham ke baras,
s:
Aye barish zara tham ke baras,
Jab mera yaar aa jaye to jam ke baras,
Pehle na baras ki woh aa na sake,
Phir itna baras ki woh ja na sake.

st: Kisne bheege hue baalon se ye jhatkaa pani,
s:
Kisne bheege hue baalon se ye jhatkaa pani,
Jhoom ke aayi ghata toot ke barasa pani.

Koi matawali ghata peeke jawani ki umang,
Dil baha le gaya barsat ka pehala pani.

st: Bin badal barsaat nahin hoti,
s:
Bin badal barsaat nahin hoti,
Suraj doobe bina raat nahin hoti,
Ab kuchh aise haalat hain hamare ki,
Aapko dekhe bagair din ki shuruwat nahin hoti.

st: Kash meri zindegi mein aaye ek aisi barsaat
s:
Kash meri zindegi mein aaye ek aisi barsaat
Mere hath mein ho tera hath
Bheegte rahein hum saari raat
Honth rahe khamosh
Bas aankhon se ho teri meri baat

st: Is barish mein mujhe tera pyar bhi
s:
Is barish mein mujhe tera pyar bhi
Kachchi mitti ki maanind laga
Ke jaise chand lamhon ki inayaton ke baad
Zameen ko sara saal pyasa rehna hai.

st: Mausam tha beqarar tumhein sochate rahe
s:
Mausam tha beqarar tumhein sochate rahe
Kul raat bar bar tumhein sochate rahe
Baarish hui to lag kar ghar ke dareeche se hum
Chup chap beqarar tumhein sochate rahe.

st: Yeh barishein bhi tum si hain,
s:
Yeh barishein bhi tum si hain,
Jo baras gayi to bahar hain,
Jo thehar gayi to qarar hain,
Kabhie aa gayi yun hi besabab,
Kabhie chha gayi yun hi Roz o Shab
Kabhie shor hain, Kabhie chup si hain,
Kissi Yaad mayn kissi Raat ko,
Yeh barishein bhi tum si hain,

Ek dabi hui si raakh ko,
Kabhie yun huwa ka bujha dia,
Kabhie khud se khud ko jala dia,
Kahin boond boond mein gum si hain.

Yeh barishein bhi tum si hain,

st: Barishon ke mosam mein,
s:
Barishon ke mosam mein,
Tum ko yaad karney ki,
Aadatien purani hain!....,
Ab ki bar socha hai,
Aadatien badal dalein,
Phir khayal aaya ke ,
Aadatein badalne se,
Barishein nahin rukti.

st: Aaj halki halki baarish hai,
s:
Aaj halki halki baarish hai,
Aaj sard hawa ka raqs bhi hai,

Aaj phool bhi nikhre nikhre hain,
Aaj un main tumhara aks bhi hai,

st: In barishon se adab-e-mohobbat seekho faraz,
s:
In barishon se adab-e-mohobbat seekho faraz,
Agar yeh ruth bhi jayein to barasti bohot hain.

st: Yaadein jaag jati hain,
s:
Yaadein jaag jati hain,
Barishon ke mausam mein.

Har ghari satati hain
Barishon ke mausam mein.

Shaam bhi kisi surat,
Chain se nahin kat-ti

Subahein bhi satati hain
Barishon ke mausam mein.

Zehen ke jharokhe mein
Jab koi sada ubhre.

Aankhein bheeg jati hain
Barishon ke mausam mein.

st: Gham ki barish ne bhi tere gham ko dhoya nahi,
s:
Gham ki barish ne bhi tere gham ko dhoya nahi,
Tu ne mujh ko kho dia maine tujhe khoya nahi.

Nend ka halka gulabi sa khumar ankhon mein tha,
Yun laga jaise woh shab der tak soya nahiiii

Janta hoon ek isi shakhs ko main bhi faraz,
Gham se patthar ho gaya magar roya nahi.

st: Barsaat mein jab
s:
Barsaat mein jab
Barish hoti thi
Hum park mein baitha karte the
Barish mein bheega karte the.

Aur Aaj

Waisa hi barsaat ka din hai
Park ke bench pe
Tanha baitha bheeg raha hoon
Jin mein hum tum sang bheege the
Un lamhon ko soch raha raha hoon.

st: Kabhi hum bheegate hain chahaton ki tej baarish mein...
s:
Kabhi hum bheegate hain chahaton ki tej baarish mein...
Kabhi barson nahin milte kisi halki se ek ranjish mein...

Tumhi mein dewtaon ki khushboo nahin thi warna...
Kami koi nahin thi mere andaaz-e-parastish mein...

Ye pehle soch lo phir aur bhi tanha na hojana...
Use chhoone ki khuwahish mein use paane ki koshish mein...

Buhat se zakham hain dil mein magar ek zakham aisa hai...
Jo jal uthta hai raaton mein jo lau deta hai baarish mein...

st: Jab Jab Aata Hai Yeh Barsaat Ka Mausam Teri Yaad Sath Hoti Hai Hamdum, Socha Is Mausam Mein Tujhe Yaad Nhi Karenge, Par Fir Socha Ki Hum Barish Ko Kaise Rok Payenge…
s: Jab Jab Aata Hai Yeh Barsaat Ka Mausam Teri Yaad Sath Hoti Hai Hamdum, Socha Is Mausam Mein Tujhe Yaad Nhi Karenge, Par Fir Socha Ki Hum Barish Ko Kaise Rok Payenge…

st: Barishon Ke Mausam Mein Badalun Kaise Mein Ek Gaon Ke Rah Par Yaad Hai Miley Thy Hum Phir Ye Hadsa Howa Aasman Tu Tham Giya Lekin Apni Ankhon Sy Tab Se Le Ke Aj Tak Barashein Barasti Hein'
s: Barishon Ke Mausam Mein Badalun Kaise Mein Ek Gaon Ke Rah Par Yaad Hai Miley Thy Hum Phir Ye Hadsa Howa Aasman Tu Tham Giya Lekin Apni Ankhon Sy Tab Se Le Ke Aj Tak Barashein Barasti Hein'

st: Mai Nee Uss Sey Aik Bar Poochaa Kaa Dhoop Mai Barish Hootii Hai Too Woo Hasnee Lagii Aur Hastee Hastee Ronee Lagiii Aur Dhoop Mai Barish Hoona Lagi
s: Mai Nee Uss Sey Aik Bar Poochaa Kaa Dhoop Mai Barish Hootii Hai Too Woo Hasnee Lagii Aur Hastee Hastee Ronee Lagiii Aur Dhoop Mai Barish Hoona Lagi

st: Nafrat Ki Dhoop Me Barsat Se Pehle, Halaat Na Thay Aese Teri Mulaqat Se Pehle, Har Kisi Ko Hamdard Samajh Lete Thay, Hum Bhi Kitne Saada Thay Muhabbaton K Tajurbat Se Pehle.
s: Nafrat Ki Dhoop Me Barsat Se Pehle, Halaat Na Thay Aese Teri Mulaqat Se Pehle, Har Kisi Ko Hamdard Samajh Lete Thay, Hum Bhi Kitne Saada Thay Muhabbaton K Tajurbat Se Pehle.

st: Main Nay Ussay Poocha Tha,
s:
Main Nay Ussay Poocha Tha,
Kya Dhoop Main Barish Hoti Hai??
Wo Hanstay Hanstay Ronay Lagi
Aur Dhoop Main Barish Honay Lagi….

st: Barish Main, Main Apne Dil Ko Roota Dekh Raha Tha,
s:
Barish Main, Main Apne Dil Ko Roota Dekh Raha Tha,
Kuch Kahe Bina Tum, Rabb Ke Ghar Chali Gaye,

st: Meetha Hai Kosa Hai
s:
Meetha Hai Kosa Hai
Baarish Ka Bosa Hai
Meetha Hai Kosa Hai
Baarish Ka Bosa Hai
Maine Mangaya Tha Idli
Tu Laaya Dosa Hai
